mapper.select: select d.dept_name as dept, e.emp_name as name, e.emp_seq as seq, r.role_name as role from employee e left outer join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code left outer join role r on e.role_code=r.role_code where e.emp_seq!=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apv_line VALUES(apv_line_sequence.nextval, #{apvStatusCode}, #{apverId}, null, #{lineOrder}, null, #{docSeq})
mapper.select: select a.*, e.EMP_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, r.ROLE_NAME from apv_line a join employee e on a.APVER_ID=e.EMP_SEQ join department d on e.DEPT_CODE=d.DEPT_CODE join role r on e.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE where doc_seq=#{seq} order by line_order

select p.*, e.EMP_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, r.ROLE_NAME from participants_line p join employee e on p.EMP_SEQ=e.EMP_SEQ join department d on e.DEPT_CODE=d.DEPT_CODE join role r on e.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE where doc_seq=#{seq}
select * from participants_line where emp_seq = #{empSeq} and read_yn='n'
mapper.update: UPDATE apv_line SET apv_status_code = CASE WHEN line_seq = #{seq} THEN 3 WHEN doc_seq = (SELECT doc_seq FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) AND line_order = (SELECT line_order + 1 FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) THEN 1 WHEN doc_seq = (SELECT doc_seq FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) AND line_order >= (SELECT line_order + 2 FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) THEN 2 END, line_apv_date= CASE WHEN line_seq=#{seq} THEN sysdate else line_apv_date END WHERE line_seq = #{seq} OR (doc_seq = (SELECT doc_seq FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) AND line_order >= (SELECT line_order + 1 FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}))

UPDATE apv_line SET apv_status_code = CASE WHEN line_seq = #{seq} THEN 4 WHEN doc_seq = (SELECT doc_seq FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) AND line_order >= (SELECT line_order + 1 FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) THEN 9 END, line_apv_date= CASE WHEN line_seq=#{seq} THEN sysdate else line_apv_date END, line_apver_cmt = CASE WHEN line_seq = #{seq} THEN #{reasonForRejection} END WHERE line_seq = #{seq} OR (doc_seq = (SELECT doc_seq FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}) AND line_order >= (SELECT line_order + 1 FROM apv_line WHERE line_seq = #{seq}))
update apv_line SET apv_status_code = 8 WHERE line_seq = #{seq}
update participants_line set read_yn = 'y', read_date = sysdate where line_seq=#{lineSeq}
